column4: is there a way to change the default cpu frequency in ubuntu?
personally I just gave up about that, there are about 3 or 4 systems in parallel setting cpufreq
Though I had some success by manipulating the min and max frequencies that the kernel allows

i know, it's really bugging me. the default is "ondemand", and it's not doing it for me, i would liek to make it 100%, BUT since I have 4 cores i have to use 4 cpu applets and it looks messy and unnecessary :S
